header.description: I am 24 years old and I really like programming and I have no problem adapting and learning new technologies in order to perform correctly in my position. I am a responsible, punctual, active person and I like to help my colleagues with whatever is within my reach, although I also usually ask for help to correct my mistakes and avoid delays at work.
